amendment.description: To raise taxes and spending by enacting President Obama's fiscal year 2016 budget.

vote.text: Amendment SA 357 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 1 - 98. Record Vote Number: 85.

action.text: Amendment SA 357 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S1758-1762, S1768) To raise taxes and spending by enacting President Obama's fiscal year 2016 budget.
